trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of drawings that can be operated upon as a single drawing.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di disegni che possono essere usati come un unico disegno.

trans-unit.source: Use a DrawingGroup to combine multiple drawings into a single, composite drawing.
trans-unit.target: Consente di combinare più disegni in un unico disegno composto DrawingGroup.

trans-unit.source: Unlike other <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objects, you can apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> setting, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>, or a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> to a DrawingGroup.
trans-unit.target: A differenza degli altri <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>oggetti, è possibile applicare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>impostazione <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>, o un <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>per DrawingGroup.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>

trans-unit.source: The flexibility of this class enables you to create complex scenes.
trans-unit.target: La flessibilità di questa classe consente di creare scene complesse.

trans-unit.source: Because DrawingGroup is also a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>, it can contain other DrawingGroup objects.
trans-unit.target: Poiché DrawingGroup è anche un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>, può contenere altri oggetti DrawingGroup.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objects, see [Drawing Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>degli oggetti, vedere [panoramica sugli oggetti disegno](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the DrawingGroup class provides several special features: DrawingGroup objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Funzionalità dell'oggetto Freezable:** perché eredita dal <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>(classe), la classe DrawingGroup fornisce diverse funzionalità speciali: DrawingGroup oggetti è possibile dichiarati come, condivisi tra più oggetti, in sola lettura per migliorare le prestazioni, clonare e resi thread-safe.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle diverse funzionalità fornite da <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>degli oggetti, vedere [panoramica sugli oggetti Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Opens the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> in order to populate its <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children*>. This method enables you to append additional <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children*> to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Apre il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> per popolare il relativo <> </> *>. Questo metodo consente di aggiungere ulteriori <> </> *> a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You must close the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext> before you can render this <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: È necessario chiudere <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext>prima che è possibile eseguire il rendering di questo <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> that you can use to describe the contents of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> che è possibile utilizzare per descrivere il contenuto di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> to apply to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref> da applicare a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about bitmap effects and how they work, see [Bitmap Effects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli effetti bitmap e sul relativo funzionamento, vedere [Cenni preliminari sugli effetti Bitmap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: operations are applied in the following order: - - - BitmapEffect - - ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: le operazioni vengono applicate nell'ordine seguente: - - - BitmapEffect - - # # informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None|

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> to apply to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref> da applicare a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the region where the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> applies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect*> and, optionally, a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> to use as input for its <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'area in cui il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> si applica relativo <> </> *> e, facoltativamente, un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> da utilizzare come input per il relativo <> </> *>.

trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The region where the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> is applied and, optionally, the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> to use as input; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect*> applies to the whole <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> and uses the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> as its input.
trans-unit.target: L'area in cui il <> </> *> del <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> viene applicata e, facoltativamente, il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> da utilizzare come input; o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se il <> </> *> applicata all'intero <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> e utilizza il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> come input.

trans-unit.source: The default is<xref uid="langword_csharp_ null" name=" null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è<xref uid="langword_csharp_ null" name=" null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffectInput*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffectInput*>

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> objects that are contained in this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref> gli oggetti contenuti in questa <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The z-order of the child items in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> is determined by the order of the child items in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: L'ordine z degli elementi figlio in un <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>è determinato dall'ordine elementi figlio nella <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection> <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: Each child drawing is under the next child in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ogni elemento figlio di disegno è sotto l'elemento figlio successivo nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> objects in this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta del <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref> gli oggetti in questa <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è vuoto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the clip region of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'area di ritaglio di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Drawings outside the geometry are clipped from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: I disegni esterni alla geometria vengono ritagliati dal <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>quando è sottoposto a rendering.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: The geometry does not have to be rectangular; for example, you can use an <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry> to clip to an elliptical shape.
trans-unit.target: La geometria non è necessario rettangolare. ad esempio, è possibile utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>per ritagliare una forma ellittica.</xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>le operazioni vengono applicate nell'ordine seguente: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>2.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>3.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>4.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>

trans-unit.source: ClipGeometry 5.
trans-unit.target: ClipGeometry 5.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> 6.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>6.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that is used to clip this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> utilizzato per ritagliare l'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> and makes deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia completa modificabile dell'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> ed esegue copie complete dei suoi valori.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per produrre copie modificabili di sola lettura <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings even though they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: Quando questo metodo copia le proprietà di dipendenza, copia delle associazioni dati e dei riferimenti di risorsa anche se non possono risolvere.

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Non copia le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Il <> </> *> proprietà dell'oggetto clonato restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se il <> </> *> è di proprietà dell'origine<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> object and makes deep copies of its current values.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia completa modificabile dell'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> oggetto ed esegue copie complete dei relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per produrre copie modificabili di sola lettura <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo copia i riferimenti alle risorse, i data binding e le animazioni, sebbene una copia i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <> </> *> è di proprietà dell'oggetto clonato <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se il <> </> *> è di proprietà dell'origine <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet"></xref> to apply to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet"> </xref> da applicare a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A> of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> is applied after the GuidelineSet.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A>di questo <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>viene applicato dopo il GuidelineSet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the GuidelineSet is transformed along with the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, il GuidelineSet viene trasformato insieme al contenuto di <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet"></xref> to apply to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet"> </xref> da applicare a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'opacità dell'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value of `1` specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> is completely opaque; a value of `0` specifies that it is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Il valore `1` specifica che il <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>è completamente opaco; il valore `0` specifica che è completamente trasparente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: A value that is less than 0 is treated as 0, and a value that is larger than 1 is treated as 1.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che è minore di 0 viene trattato come 0, e un valore maggiore di 1 viene considerato come 1.

trans-unit.source: Another way to control the opacity of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> is to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity%2A> of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: Un altro modo per controllare l'opacità di un <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>consiste nello specificare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity%2A>relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>le operazioni vengono applicate nell'ordine seguente: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>2.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>

trans-unit.source: Opacity 3.
trans-unit.target: Opacità 3.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>4.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A> 5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>5.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> 6.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>6.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 1, inclusive, that describes the opacity of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore compreso tra 0 e 1, inclusi, che descrive l'opacità dell'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is `1`.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è `1`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush used to alter the opacity of select regions of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il pennello usato per modificare l'opacità delle aree di selezione di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> is mapped to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>Viene eseguito il mapping a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>

trans-unit.source: The opacity value of each pixel of the mapped <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> is used to determine the resulting opacity of each corresponding pixel of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di opacità di ogni pixel di con mapping <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>viene utilizzato per determinare l'opacità risultante di ogni pixel corrispondente <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Only the opacity value of each color in the brush is used for this processing; all other color information is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Solo il valore di opacità del colore del pennello è utilizzato per l'elaborazione. tutte le altre informazioni di colore viene ignorati.

trans-unit.source: The opacity that this property specifies is multiplied with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: L'opacità specificata da questa proprietà viene moltiplicato per il <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>valore di <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about opacity masks and how they work, see [Opacity Masks Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle maschere di opacità e sul relativo funzionamento, vedere [Panoramica maschera di opacità](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>le operazioni vengono applicate nell'ordine seguente: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.source: OpacityMask 2.
trans-unit.target: OpacityMask 2.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>3.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>4.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A> 5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>5.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> 6.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>6.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that describes the opacity of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> indicates that no opacity mask exists and the opacity is uniform.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> che descrive l'opacità dell'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> indica che è presente alcuna maschera di opacità e che l'opacità è uniforme.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Opens the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> in order to populate its <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children*> and clears any existing <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children*>.
trans-unit.target: Apre il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> per popolare il relativo <> </> *> e cancella qualsiasi esistente <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: You must close the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext> before you can render this <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: È necessario chiudere il <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext>prima che è possibile eseguire il rendering di questo <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> that can be used to describe the contents of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> che può essere utilizzato per descrivere il contenuto di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"></xref> that is applied to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"> </xref> che viene applicato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To apply multiple transforms to a single <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Per applicare più trasformazioni a un singolo <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>le operazioni vengono applicate nell'ordine seguente: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>
